heading: Leaderboard
title: Leaderboard - Game Scores Web App
description: Leaderboard is a project that lets users see a list of scores. It also provides the user with a form to add his own scores to the list. It uses the Leaderboard API to get and post scores. It was coded using standard technologies like HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript; and has an object-oriented approach using a model view presenter pattern.

heading: To Do List
subheading: A Minimalist TODO List Web App
title: To Do List - A Minimalist TODO List Web App
description: To Do List is a single page web app that lets users manage a simple list of tasks. Users can add and remove tasks from the list. It was coded using standard technologies like HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript; and has an object-oriented approach using a model view presenter pattern. Feel free to give me feedback or contact me about this project.
